name: AVCaptureDevice.WhiteBalanceMode
desc: Constants to specify the white balance mode of a capture device.

items.name: case locked
items.desc: The white balance setting is locked.

items.name: case autoWhiteBalance
items.desc: The device performs an auto white balance operation now.

items.name: case continuousAutoWhiteBalance
items.desc: The device continuously monitors white balance and adjusts when necessary.
